content.title: Funded already! Thank you!!
content.creator:
Dog Paw
March 25, 2025
content.content:
We're truly blown away by your support! Thank you so much to everyone who's helped us achieve our funding goal in less than a day! Seeing this idea resonate with so many people has been quite the journey for us, and we can't express how excited we are to send out these instruments and see what music you all will make.
From the beginning, our vision has been to make music more expressive, intuitive, and joyful for everyone—whether you're a seasoned performer or just starting your musical journey. This milestone is just the beginning, and we’re beyond grateful to have you with us.
Let’s keep the momentum going—spread the word, share the project, and help us venture into the future of music-making together!
